EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Referral (1325194730.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear William,
Hello, my name is Nicolette Taylor, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Harvey Lieberman. Harvey has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services to see if it is something that you might find valuable. You can schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
